languages.text: {n}Дознаватель смотрит на вас с нескрываемым любопытством.{/n} "Учитывая наш совместный боевой опыт, {name}, я уверен, что если кто-то и выдержит подобное испытание, то это вы. С другой стороны, стоит ли лишний раз дразнить {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Архиврага{/g}?"

{n}The Interrogator looks at you with unabashed curiosity.{/n} "Considering the combat experience we've had together, {name}, I'm sure that if anyone is up to a challenge like that, it's you. On the other hand, is it really worth it to tempt the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g} when you don't have to?"
languages.original_text: {n}Дознаватель смотрит на вас с нескрываемым любопытством.{/n} "Учитывая наш совместный боевой опыт, {name}, я уверен, что если кто-то и выдержит подобное испытание, то это вы. С другой стороны, стоит ли лишний раз дразнить {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Архиврага{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The interrogator looks at you with unabashed curiosity.{/n} "Considering the combat experience we've had together, {name}, I'm sure that if anyone is up to a challenge like that, it's you. On the other hand, is it really worth it to tempt the Archenemy when you don't have to?"

{n}The Interrogator looks at you with unabashed curiosity.{/n} "Considering the combat experience we've had together, {name}, I'm sure that if anyone is up to a challenge like that, it's you. On the other hand, is it really worth it to tempt the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g} when you don't have to?"

{n}The Interrogator looks at you with unabashed curiosity.{/n} "Considering the combat experience we've had together, {name}, I'm sure that if anyone is up to a challenge like that, it's you. On the other hand, is it really worth it to tempt the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g} when you don't have to?"

languages.text: {n}El interrogador te observa con una curiosidad desvergonzada.{/n} «Considerando las experiencias de combate que hemos vivido juntos, {name}, estoy convencido de que, si alguien está a la altura de un reto como este, es usted. Por otro lado, ¿merece realmente la pena tentar al {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archienemigo{/g} sin necesidad?».
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator looks at you with unabashed curiosity.{/n} "Considering the combat experience we've had together, {name}, I'm sure that if anyone is up to a challenge like that, it's you. On the other hand, is it really worth it to tempt the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g} when you don't have to?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El interrogador te observa con una curiosidad desvergonzada.{/n} «Considerando las experiencias de combate que hemos vivido juntos, {name}, estoy convencido de que, si alguien está a la altura de un reto como este, es usted. Por otro lado, ¿merece realmente la pena tentar al Archienemigo sin necesidad?».

languages.text: {n}インテロゲイターは、好奇心を隠しもせずこちらを見ている。{/n}「{name}、共に戦ってきた経験を考えれば、そういった挑戦ができる者がいるとすれば確実にあなただろう。しかし一方で、その必要がないのに、{g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}渾沌の勢力{/g}を誘い出す価値が本当にあるのだろうか？」
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator looks at you with unabashed curiosity.{/n} "Considering the combat experience we've had together, {name}, I'm sure that if anyone is up to a challenge like that, it's you. On the other hand, is it really worth it to tempt the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g} when you don't have to?"

traits.locale_text: {n}インテロゲイターは、好奇心を隠しもせずこちらを見ている。{/n}「{name}、共に戦ってきた経験を考えれば、そういった挑戦ができる者がいるとすれば確実にあなただろう。しかし一方で、その必要がないのに、渾沌の勢力を誘い出す価値が本当にあるのだろうか？」

languages.text: {n}海因里希看着你，目光中带着毫不掩饰的好奇。{/n}“考虑到我们并肩作战的经历，{name}，我相信，如果有哪个人能胜任这样的挑战，那这个人非你莫属。不过话说回来，这相当于在毫无必要的情况下引起{g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}混沌大敌{/g}的注意，这么做真的值得吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator looks at you with unabashed curiosity.{/n} "Considering the combat experience we've had together, {name}, I'm sure that if anyone is up to a challenge like that, it's you. On the other hand, is it really worth it to tempt the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g} when you don't have to?"

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希看着你，目光中带着毫不掩饰的好奇。{/n}“考虑到我们并肩作战的经历，{name}，我相信，如果有哪个人能胜任这样的挑战，那这个人非你莫属。不过话说回来，这相当于在毫无必要的情况下引起混沌大敌的注意，这么做真的值得吗？”

languages.text: {n}Der Interrogator blickt dich mit unverhohlener Neugier an.{/n} "Nach all den Kämpfen, die wir gemeinsam ausgefochten haben, {name}, bin ich mir sicher: Wenn jemand dieser Herausforderung gewachsen ist, dann Ihr. Andererseits ... Ihr würdet den {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Erzfeind{/g} unnötig herausfordern. Ist es das wirklich wert?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator looks at you with unabashed curiosity.{/n} "Considering the combat experience we've had together, {name}, I'm sure that if anyone is up to a challenge like that, it's you. On the other hand, is it really worth it to tempt the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g} when you don't have to?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Interrogator blickt dich mit unverhohlener Neugier an.{/n} "Nach all den Kämpfen, die wir gemeinsam ausgefochten haben, {name}, bin ich mir sicher: Wenn jemand dieser Herausforderung gewachsen ist, dann Ihr. Andererseits ... Ihr würdet den Erzfeind unnötig herausfordern. Ist es das wirklich wert?"

languages.text: {n}L'interrogateur vous regarde sans chercher à masquer sa curiosité.{/n} « À en juger par les combats que nous avons livrés ensemble, {name}, je ne doute pas que vous soyez à la hauteur d'un tel défi. Reste à savoir s'il est judicieux de tenter ainsi le {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Grand Ennemi{/g} alors que vous pouvez faire autrement. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator looks at you with unabashed curiosity.{/n} "Considering the combat experience we've had together, {name}, I'm sure that if anyone is up to a challenge like that, it's you. On the other hand, is it really worth it to tempt the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g} when you don't have to?"

Reste à savoir s'il est judicieux de tenter ainsi le Grand Ennemi alors que vous pouvez faire autrement. »

{n}L'interrogateur vous regarde sans chercher à masquer sa curiosité.{/n} « À en juger par les combats que nous avons livrés ensemble, {name}, je ne doute pas que vous soyez à la hauteur d'un tel défi. Reste à savoir s'il est judicieux de tenter ainsi le Grand Ennemi alors que vous pouvez faire autrement. »

languages.text: {n}Sorgucu, gizlemeye gerek duymadığı bir merakla sana bakıyor.{/n} "{name}, birlikte edindiğimiz çatışma tecrübesini göz önünde bulundurursak eminim ki böylesi bir zorluğun üstesinden gelebilecek birisi varsa o da sensin. Bununla birlikte hiç gerek olmadığı hâlde {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Şerbaşı'nı{/g} kışkırtmaya değer mi?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator looks at you with unabashed curiosity.{/n} "Considering the combat experience we've had together, {name}, I'm sure that if anyone is up to a challenge like that, it's you. On the other hand, is it really worth it to tempt the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g} when you don't have to?"
